content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code peace50 for 50% off the original price or use the code peace100 for a free copy if you download for free i d love it if you gave this pattern a ❤️ thank you for your support the *world peace coaster* is a quick beginner-friendly project that s just as enjoyable to make as it is to use designed with simplicity in mind it works up in no time perfect for a cozy evening crochet session a thoughtful handmade gift or a fun way to use up leftover yarn what makes this coaster special is its playful mix of stitches finished with a pretty shell border that adds just the right touch of charm easy to customize with your favorite colors this little design is a sweet reminder of calm and creativity bringing handmade joy to your table every day this pattern is designed with dk weight yarn and a 4 5 mm hook for coasters i recommend choosing a synthetic or plant-based fiber both are durable easy to wash and perfect for everyday use the design is worked in the round using a mix of simple stitches triple crochet double_crochet single_crochet and chains which come together to create a playful texture and look a decorative shell border finishes each coaster with a charming touch the pattern is written in one standard size that comfortably fits most mugs but it s easy to adjust you can customize your coasters by changing your hook size experimenting with different yarn weights or simply adding an extra round or two gauge is not crucial in this pattern beginner-friendly and approachable this project relies on basic stitches and straightforward techniques to help you along the way the pattern includes a step-by-step photo tutorial as well as links to video demonstrations for any special stitches thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it if you enjoyed this pattern you may be interested in some of my other patterns you can check them out here 1 you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if
